itemDescription: computational organic chemist at Imperial College London

wikipedia_page.main: Henry Stephen Rzepa (born 1950) is a chemist and Emeritus Professor of Computational chemistry at  Imperial College London.

response: It was pointed out by Henry Rzepa that the conversion of intermediate 5 to 6 can proceed by either a Hückel or a Möbius transition state.The Aromaticity of Pericyclic Reaction Transition States Henry S. Rzepa J. Chem. Educ. 2007, 84, 1535. Abstract
